skills.skill: Microcontroller Selection and Power Management Strategy

duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in the design process, presenting new designs and data, and accepting feedback from internal and external partners
Architect, implement, and maintain complex firmware/software designs
Write clean, robust, and testable code tailored for embedded systems
Debug and resolve system issues related to the product firmware, software, and systems
Collaborate in the definition and bring up of new sensing chipsets, ASIC’s, and SOC’s
Specify and document communication protocols, system states, and feature requirements in partnership with other firmware and software teams
Collaborate with Quality Engineering teams for white-box testing
Collaborate with the Continuous Integration team for new automated testing strategies

education_certification.credential: BS in Electrical or Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Mechatronics, or related field
